head.title: WHITE PLAINS: JUDICIAL INSTITUTE FOR PACE

hedline.hl1: WHITE PLAINS: JUDICIAL INSTITUTE FOR PACE

abstract.p: Pace University is building $15 million training institute for judges; only other judiciary school in US is National Judicial College of Reno, which is neither run by courts nor connected to a law school (S)

block.p: Pace University is building a $15 million training institute for judges who want a better understand of changing issues like domestic violence. The three-story, 28,000-square-foot institute, which will take two years to complete on the Pace campus, will include conference and training rooms and will offer training in areas like cross-examination procedures. The only other judiciary school in the United States is the National Judicial College of Reno, which is neither run by the courts nor connected to a law school.
